hero.description: Analyze people flow with our advanced AI. Get accurate insights to optimize your spaces and improve customer experience.
hero.startFreeDescription: Create a free account to start analyzing crowd flow
hero.viewDemoDescription: Discover features with an interactive demonstration

urbanAnalysis.title: Urban crowd flow analysis
urbanAnalysis.description: Our real-time counting and analysis solution transforms urban flow management into a true lever for efficiency and quality of life. Through advanced detection algorithms and AI, we provide accurate data on density (as heatmap - coming soon) and people movement in public spaces, shops, stations, transport, and event areas.

storeAnalysis.title: Advanced behavioral analysis in stores
storeAnalysis.description: By providing accurate data on the number of customers, their distribution and their journey inside the store, teams can optimize aisle layout, improve customer service and adapt resources according to activity peaks. This information also allows measuring the impact of promotions, anticipating flows and creating a smoother and more satisfying customer experience.

portManagement.title: Smart management of port, marina or commercial zones
portManagement.description: By providing accurate data on the number of vessels, their position, rotation and dwell time, operators can optimize loading and unloading schedules, reduce waiting times and improve operational flow.

features.title: Why choose SocialAffluence?
features.description: Our platform combines artificial intelligence and real-time analysis to offer you unprecedented insights.

aiPrecision.title: AI Precision
aiPrecision.description: Advanced detection powered by TensorFlow with 95%+ accuracy to identify people and vehicles.

realTime.title: Real Time
realTime.description: Live monitoring with instant metric updates and automatic alerts.

fullHistory.title: Complete History
fullHistory.description: Analyze trends by day, week or month with interactive charts and CSV/PDF exports.

multiCamera.title: Multi-Camera
multiCamera.description: Manage multiple cameras simultaneously with zone filtering and centralized overview.

secure.title: Secure
secure.description: Encrypted data, GDPR compliance and secure storage with multi-factor authentication.

zeroInstall.title: Zero Installation
zeroInstall.description: Everything works directly on your phone, no complex configuration required. Start in seconds!

contact.title: Have questions?
